channel.title: Legacy 614 Loading error
channel.description:
guys whenever i try to load legacy 614, it says.
[15:10:04] [Server] connecting to vote4tokens database class not found exception no suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql:www.legacy.org:3306/legacy_vote unable to connect to mysql press any key to continue...
guys can you help me fix this error please!

hey, ive tried that but i can’t find out how could you please help me?

item.title: Legacy 614 Loading error

item.description:
@xX_CoDeR_AJ wrote:

Server is coded with MySQL, if you didnt set it up, look at tuts on how to remove it. if you did use it than recreate the vote4tokens DB
